Header.title: Care free freelancing
Header.paragraph: Let us take the bureaucracy out of freelancing, leaving you to focus on what you like most

About.paragraph: When we landed our first freelance job, the first things that we thought were traveling and freedom, not accounting, paying taxes, social securities and VAT. Since there was no alternative at the time, we did all the boring staff. Then magic happened; wannabe freelancers start approaching us for counseling, and most of them realized that it made more financial sense to use our services, rather than set up everything on their own. Thus happyharbor has expanded in professional services.
Why: Pay as low tax as legally possible

Testimonials.text: Happy harbor helped me immensely to make the transition from my old job to freelancing. The guys are eager to help and quick to analyse all the financial decisions.
Testimonials.name: Mustafa Erdemlier

Features.title: Net salary calculator
Features.text: Use our salary calculator to find out your net salary under different setups, and find out the easy way, why you should join us.

Features.title: Providence Fund
Features.text: Think more about the future, pay less taxes now. We have partnered with emergo wealth to provide a complete portfolio of services.

Features.title: No bureaucracy
Features.text: We pay your corporate tax, VAT, VIES, social securities, gesy, providence fund; we handle all invoicing and accounting.

Features.title: Remote oriented
Features.text: There is no need for a physical presence at any point during our collaboration, though we will be delighted to meed you. Our mindset is remote first.
